title: Inflation? You Ain't Seen Nothin' Yet! | 3/7/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show by talking with his head writer and chief researcher, Jason Buttrill, who shares what’s happening on the ground in Ukraine. Pat Gray joins to further discuss the updates in Ukraine and President Biden’s handling of the issue. Glenn gives the latest numbers on inflation, as he and Stu discuss how far inflation is reaching. Glenn warns of some tactical errors one can make when discussing current affairs with some family members. Glenn and Stu discuss how the collective boycott of Russia is only testing the waters for the Great Reset. Glenn discusses the issue of juggling care for Ukraine without hurting ourselves. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
